doc:
Lillian Leighton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lillian_Leighton 0 Lillianne Brown Leighton (May 17, 1874 – March 19, 1956), known professionally as Lillian Leighton, was an American silent film actress. Leighton started her career in Chicago. She was signed in 1910 and starred in over 200 films before her retirement in 1940. Leighton died in Woodland Hills, Los Angeles on March 19, 1956 at the age of 81. Lillianne_Brown_Leighton ( May_17_,_1874 – March_19_,_1956 ) , known professionally as Lillian_Leighton , was an_American_silent_film_actress . Leighton started her_career in Chicago . She was_signed in 1910 and starred in over_200_films before her_retirement in 1940 . Leighton died in Woodland_Hills , Los_Angeles on March_19_,_1956 at the_age of 81 .
